file.title: Split

p.text: Lets see how many parts can be divided into text, parts of which will be separated by a character or string. For example, if you break the text "Hello, how are you, eh?" apart, indicating separation character ",". That text would break into "hello", "how are you" and "huh?" And the command will return you to the number equal to "3".
p.textAll: If you want to take any one part, then use the commando Split into parts .
